author: Weizhen Tan
title: Hong Kong is 'highly resilient' as it fights to save the economy in the pandemic, commerce secretary says
description: Hong Kong is fighting a "twin battle" of the coronavirus pandemic as well as saving its battered economy, but its recovery will be determined by when the world gets back on its feet, says the city's commerce secretary.
content:
Hong Kong's popular nightlife district, Lan Kwai Fong is mostly empty amid the Coronavirus outbreak
Hong Kong is fighting a "twin battle" fending off the coronavirus pandemic and trying to save its battered economy at the same time  but the city remains "hig… [+3590 chars]
